song.title: Don't Punish My Sync Claire
song.info: This track placed 3rd in the Revision 2016 demo party Oldskool Music compo. It uses a variety of cool effects and an unique speech synthesis at the end based on hardware envelopes' frequency change with mix of quare wave sound made specially and manually on the AY chip. No digital samples used! Composed on the ZX Spectrum 128 computer with AY 3-8912 soundchip. Uses ACB stereo separation.
